c74object.name: hoa.recomposer
c74object.digest: A GUI to manipulate virtual microphones.
c74object.description:
hoa.recomposer
helps you to place virtual microphones on the scene to warp the soundfield. (can be used to control the hoa.recomposer~ object).

metadatalist.metadata: HoaLibrary by Julien Colafrancesco, Pierre Guillot, Eliott Paris.

outlet.name: list
outlet.digest: Virtual Microphones Angles and directivities Values.
outlet.description: Virtual Microphones Angles and directivities Values. (you may connect me to the hoa.recomposer~ object in free mode).

method.name: angles
method.description:
Set the Virtual microphones Angles.
- set All Mics With a list for each mics.
- set individual Mic with an (int + float) list => index, angle value.
- set the same value for all mics with a list (-1 "angle value")

method.name: directivities
method.description:
Set the Virtual microphones Directivities.
- set All Mics With a list for each mics.
- set individual Mic with an (int + float) list => index, angle value.
- set the same value for all mics with a list (-1 "directivity value")

method.name: set
method.digest: Set Angles or Microphones Directivities without causing outputs.
method.description:
Set the Virtual microphones Directivities.
- set All Mics With a list for each mics.
- set individual Mic with an (int + float) list => index, angle value.

method.name: reset
method.digest: Reset Angles and/or Directivities of the Mics.
method.description:
Reset Angles and/or Directivities of the Mics :
- "reset" reset all mics angles and directivities.
- "reset angles" reset all mics angles.
- "reset angles 1 3 5" reset the Mics 1 3 and 5 angles.
- "reset directivities" reset all mics directivities.
- "reset directivities 1 3 5" reset the Mics 1 3 and 5 directivities.
